article_title: Galloway mayor warns Atlantic City PILOT program may cost local taxpayers
article_text: We have used your information to see if you have a subscription with us. So far we have not found one. If you feel you are currently subscribed please click on the button to attempt to find your account.

og.description: GALLOWAY TOWNSHIP — Officials have issued a warning to taxpayers about the tax rate increasing if Gov. Chris Christie signs off on the casino payment in lieu of taxes, or PILOT, bills.
